BackEnd.Model

Class FileOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • BackEnd.Model.FileOperator

  • public class FileOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves files to and loads files from the server side.

    2018-04-03
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine Bizon, Ross Bartlett

      • saveFile

        public java.lang.String saveFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                 java.lang.String extention,
                                 byte[] fileContents)
        Saves a file to the local directory of the server side eclipse project.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file.
        extention - the extension of the file (Example, .pdf, .docx)
        fileContents - the byte contents of the file.
        Returns:
        the absolute path to the file.

      • convertPath

        Replaces all "\" "/" in a string.
        Parameters:
        absolutePath - the string that needs to be converted.
        Returns:
        the converted string.

        Creates a FileContents object given the files path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file.
        Returns:
        the fileMessage containing the files information.
